name: Unity Clash
description:
Unity Clash.
A place where numbers win. This game relies on how big you team is.
This is a local multiplayer game where 2 friends can play and clash for glory of getting more number of wins.
The game is made by with time slightly less than 3 hours, the only thing took more time was building this project for WEBGL and WindowsX64.
The Controls are
Player 1 - The Green King
W,A,S,D For moving

Player 2 - The Orange King
Arrow Keys.

Your Goal here is to turn as many neutral soldiers there are on the map. There will always be new soldiers entering the field. So keep an eye out.
The Current Build has 3 Maps.
